definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: Well, how about the roast pork chop with sour Cabbage? It's one of the specialities of the house.
sentences.chinese: 好，來份酸菜烤豬排怎麼樣？這是本店的特色菜之一。

sentences.english: And then the next day they brought you a plate with another big pork chop.
sentences.chinese: 然後第二天他們又在你面前的盤子裏放上一大塊豬排。

sentences.english: How do we make crispy pork chop?
sentences.chinese: 如何炸出酥脆美味的豬排？

sentences.english: At least a pork chop would feed you.
sentences.chinese: 豬排至少能讓你填飽肚子。

sentences.english: Remove from pan, serve with the greens.
sentences.chinese: 豬排起鍋與綠菜葉裝盤。

sentences.english: Grilled rib steak, pork chop, knuckle, chicken with herbs, spit-roasted lamb, pork meats, spaghettis.
sentences.chinese: 煎肋排，豬排，雞肉，烤羊腿，意大利細面等。
有豬排和米飯調製的肉飯。

sentences.english: Braised Pork Chop with White Beans, Stewed Mutton, Kidney in Red Wine, etc.
sentences.chinese: 我們還有洋蔥鐵扒豬排，白豆燜豬排，燉。

sentences.english: Braised Pork Chop with White Beans, Stewed Mutton, Kidney in Red Wine, etc.
sentences.chinese: 我們還有洋蔥鐵扒豬排，白豆燜豬排，燉。

sentences.english: Our Grand Pacific Heritage Red is a perfect complement to Barbeque Pork Spare Ribs and Beef Stir Fry.
sentences.chinese: 羅斯福酒園加州紅是炭烤豬排以及煎牛排的絕佳搭配。

sentences.english: This is roast beef; that is pork chops.
Serve with stir-fried asparagus and mushrooms as side dish. Ketchup or chili sauce as dipping sauce.
sentences.chinese: 蘆筍和白菇，並附番茄醬或辣醬油沾食豬排。

sentences.english: They had some fried pork chop and beancurd.
sentences.chinese: 他們吃了一些煎豬排和炒豆腐。

sentences.english: Here’s the student’s today’s lunch, french fries and pork chops.
sentences.chinese: 這是學員們今天的午餐，炸薯條和炸豬排。

sentences.english: The original concoction Mandigo made was formed as a faux pork chop.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，曼迪哥最早研製出的是一種仿豬排雜燴。

sentences.english: Braised Pork Chop with White Beans, Stewed Mutton, Kidney in Red Wine, and many other dishes.
sentences.chinese: 白豆燜豬排，燉羊肉，紅酒燴腰花等其他許多菜。

definition: tempura/deep-fried cooking/also called 甜不辣[tian2 bu4 la4]
to order à la carte/single point (of measurement, mounting etc)
iron panel/hot iron plate for fast grilling (Japanese: teppan)
